init
SimpleUpgrader

devdoc.author: Olivier VDB - <olivier@argent.xyz>, Julien Niset - <julien@argent.im>
devdoc.details: Temporary module used to add/remove other modules.

addModule(address,address).details: Adds a module to a wallet. First checks that the module is registered.

init(address).details: Perform the upgrade for a wallet. This method gets called when SimpleUpgrader is temporarily added as a module.

recoverToken(address).details: Utility method enbaling anyone to recover ERC20 token sent to the module by mistake and transfer them to the Module Registry.

devdoc.title: SimpleUpgrader
